${modID}:Cyloop.NAME: Cyloop
${modID}:Cyloop.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Retain. NL ${modID}:Cyloops the targeted enemy.

${modID}:PhantomRush.NAME: Phantom Rush
${modID}:PhantomRush.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength upon playing a card.

${modID}:SonicStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Cyloop_Finisher : Deal !M! additional damage.
